title: [Hinterwilds Caravan, Sleigh]
description: The capacious sleigh is one of several traveling swiftly toward the Hinterwilds, driven by a polite northerner.  Drawn by a team of well-fed sled dogs, the sleigh is piled high with supplies.  There are also fur blankets that, if a bit musky, provide ample warmth to both driver and riders.
